data.title: Leslie Megahey
data.meta_description: US Agent: Victoria Wisdom   Credits: JACK Stage Play After its West End run, premiered in Los Angeles (March 1996)… Full story »
data.text:
US Agent: Victoria Wisdom

Credits:

JACK

Stage Play

After its West End run, premiered in Los Angeles (March 1996) and on Broadway (May 1996)

Co-writer/Director with Nicol Williamson

1994-95 – Under exclusive contract as Screenwriter to Miramax Films, New York. Script consultant/rewriter on 7 American feature films

THE HOUR OF THE PIG

Anglo-French feature film, medieval thriller

Distributed by Miramax in the USA under the title THE ADVOCATE

Writer/Director

with Colin Firth, Nicol Williamson, Donald Pleasence, Ian Holm Miramax

DUKE BLUEBEARD’S CASTLE

Original film production of Bartok’s opera

with the London Philharmonic conducted by Adam Fischer

Director

with Robert Lloyd, Elizabeth Laurence

* International Emmy nomination; Royal Philharmonic Award; Prix Italia 1989

CARIANI AND THE COURTESANS

Film drama set in 16th century Venice

Writer/Director

with Paul McGann, Simon Callow, Diana Quick, Michael Gough

* 3 RTS Awards

SCHALCKEN THE PAINTER

Dutch ghost story based on Sheridan Lefanu story

Writer/Director/Producer

* 6 RTS nominations

ARTISTS AND MODELS

Trilogy

* Four International Awards

THE ORSON WELLES STORY

Definitive 3-hour documentary on Wells

Interviewer/Narrator/Director

* BAFTA Nomination Turner Network TV (1990)

LANDSEER: A VICTORIAN COMEDY

THE SAVAGE

ALL CLOUDS ARE CLOCKS
